job_description: Research Associate : TRANSPARENCY INTERNATIONAL BANGLADESH Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List TRANSPARENCY INTERNATIONAL BANGLADESH Research Associate Application Deadline : 15 Feb 2026 Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Age: 22 to 35 years Location: Dhaka (Dhaka Sadar) Published: 08 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Candidate must have a Master's degree with Honours at Bachelor's level, preferably in a relevant Social Science subject e.g. Anthropology, Climate Change, Development Studies, Economics, Environmental Science, Geography, Sociology, Statistics etc.; Candidate with a third division or a GPA below 2 in SSC/HSC or a CGPA below 2.5 as applicable are not considered to meet the necessary requirement; Additional Requirements Age 22 to 35 years Candidates having experience in social science research, which may include time spent in a thesis on relevant topics will be given preference; Experience in governance research in the field of solid waste management, environment, and climate change will be given preference; The candidate must be good at reading, writing and presenting in English; The candidate must possess computer skills in MS Office and Bangla typing skill using Bijoy Classic; Skill in data management and analysis using GIS Software, NVivo, STATA, KOBO Toolbox, Excel; Should be able to deliver time-bound tasks. Responsibilities & Context Transparency International Bangladesh (TIB) is inviting applications for appointment on contract basis for the position Research Associate for its project titled “Promoting Integrity in Solid Waste Management towards Climate Justice in Bangladesh” Job Description: Assist in designing data collection tools and supervising field level data collection; Assist in checking and cross-checking survey data; Collect and analyse secondary data; Data analysis and visualization using STATA and GIS Software; Assist in arranging and conducting interviews; Transcribe and translate the recorded interviews; Thematic analysis and coding of qualitative data using NVivo; Assist in writing reports in English and translate into Bangla; Assist in preparing and presenting research findings; Study related administrative work, training arrangement, communication with stakeholders; Any other tasks assigned by the management. Skills & Expertise Suggested by Research STATA Workplace Work at office Employment Status Contractual Job Location Dhaka (Dhaka Sadar) Read Before Apply Before applying, please read the full advertisement carefully in the link. শপ ক্যাশ দেখাশোনা করা এবং নিজ দায়িত্বাধীন ক্যাশ যথাযথভাবে বুঝিয়ে দেওয়া কোম্পানির মালামাল নিরাপদভাবে সংরক্ষণ ও রক্ষণাবেক্ষণ নিশ্চিত করা প্রডাক্ট স্টক ও ইনভেন্টরি নিয়মিত মেইনটেইন করা প্রতিদিনের স্টক To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Responsibilities & Context We are a 100% export-oriented renowned Woven Jackets/Outer Wear Manufacturer, looking for a dynamic, energetic, and analytic candidate for the post of "Merchandiser ". The incumbent must have experience on Outerwear categories, knowledge on Garment TC Generation. Candidates having working experience in INDITEX/BERSHKA will be given priority. Duties & Responsibilities : Merchandiser is the main responsible person to align the timeline for both development and bulk production. Position responsibilities include but are not limited to the following- Candidate having experience about garment TC generation via third party portal. The candidate should demonstrate the ability to manage "Development" and "Bulk Production Procurement" Collaborating with suppliers to ensure proper execution of merchandising plans. Able to understand buyer's tech pack, BOM sheet. Capable to analyze the comments comparing with spec sheet. To ensure samples have to be developed according to the buyer’s instruction Preparing bulk order sheets, collect PI/bill from suppliers & ensure their payment on time to maintain the better flow in supply chain Ensure all approvals (lab dips /trims/acc/ from customer end within the time frame. Advising and assisting production and quality department . Proper knowledge on fabric, material consumption. Aware about testing procedures of component as well as garments. Capable to generate TRF (Test request Form), inspection request form for 3rd party lab/auditor. The candidate will be responsible for promptly replying to and acknowledging each customer's email within 24 hours on workdays. মাইক্রোফিন্যান্স কর্মসূচির যেকোন কর্মস্থলে কাজ করার মানষিকতা থাকতে হবে। •	চাকুরীতে যোগদানের সময় ৩০০/- (তিনশত) টাকা মুল্যের নন-জুটিশিয়াল ষ্ট্যাম্পে উপযুক্ত জামিনদার কর্তৃক অঙ্গীকারনামা প্রদান করতে হবে। •	সাক্ষাৎকারের সময় মুল সনদ পত্র দেখাতে হবে এবং চাকুরীতে যোগদানের সময় সকল শিক্ষাগত যোগ্যতার মুল সনদ মানব সম্পদ বিভাগে জমা রাখতে হবে। •	চাকুরীতে যোগদানের সময় এক মাসের বেতন সমপরিমাণ টাকা (ফেরতযোগ্য) জামানত প্রদান করতে হবে এবং স্বাস্থ্য পরীক্ষার সনদ জমা প্রদান করতে হবে। Responsibilities & Context গনপ্রজাতন্ত্রী বাংলাদেশ সরকারের মাইক্রোক্রেডিট রেগুলেটরী অথরিটি (এমআরএ)’র সনদপ্রাপ্ত বে-সরকারী উন্নয়ণ সংস্থা ইকো-সোশ্যাল ডেভলপমেন্ট অর্গানাইজেশন (ইএসডিও)। ইএসডিও ১৯৮৮ সালে দরিদ্র ও প্রান্তিকদের প্রতি সংহতি প্রতিষ্ঠার লক্ষ্যে একটি মহৎ দৃষ্টি দিয়ে যাত্রা শুরু করে। জনগণের কেন্দ্রিক সংগঠন হওয়ায় ইএসডিও এমন একটি সমাজের কল্পনা করেছিল যা অসমতা ও অবিচার থেকে মুক্ত হবে। ইএসডিও সামাজিক উন্নয়ন ও দক্ষতা বৃদ্ধি মূলক বিভিন্ন কার্যক্রম/ প্রকল্প বাস্তবায়ন করে আসছে। ইএসডিও বর্তমানে দেশের ৫৩টি জেলার ৪০৮ উপজেলায় ১৫ মিলিয়ন অতি দরিদ্র মানুষের সার্বিক উন্নয়নে কাজ করছে। Job Responsibilities এমআইএস সম্পর্কিত দায়িত্ব: •	মাইক্রোফিন্যান্স ঋণ সংক্রান্ত সকল তথ্য সফটওয়্যারে সঠিকভাবে এন্ট্রি ও আপডেট করা। •	শাখার ঋণ বিতরণ, কিস্তি আদায়, বকেয়া, সঞ্চয়, জরিমানা ইত্যাদি বিষয়ে নিয়মিত রিপোর্ট তৈরি করা। •	মাসিক/ত্রৈমাসিক/বার্ষিক MIS রিপোর্ট প্রস্তুত ও ঊর্ধ্বতন কর্তৃপক্ষকে জমা দেওয়া। •	মাইক্রোফিন্যান্স প্রোগ্রামের শাখা পর্যায় থেকে প্রাপ্ত তথ্য যাচাই ও ডাটা কোয়ালিটি কন্ট্রোল করা। •	সফটওয়্যার ও ডাটাবেজ রক্ষণাবেক্ষণে আইটি টিমকে সহায়তা করা। লিগ্যাল সম্পর্কিত দায়িত্ব: •	ঋণ খেলাপির বিরুদ্ধে নোটিশ জারি ও আদালতে মামলার জন্য প্রয়োজনীয় নথিপত্র প্রস্তুত করা। •	আইনজীবীর মাধ্যমে মামলা পরিচালনা ও প্রতিনিধিত্ব করা। •	মামলার প্রাপ্ত তথ্য যাচাই ও ডাটা কোয়ালিটি কন্ট্রোল করা। •	প্রতিষ্ঠানের নীতিমালা যেন Microcredit Regulatory Authority (MRA) ও বাংলাদেশ ব্যাংকের বিধি অনুযায়ী পরিচালিত হয় তা নিশ্চিত করা। •	প্রতিষ্ঠানের জমি/অফিস ভাড়া, ক্রয় বা অন্য কোনো চুক্তি সংক্রান্ত আইনি সহায়তা প্রদান। •	মাঠকর্মীদের আইনগত সচেতনতা প্রদান এবং আইনি ঝুঁকি কমাতে প্রশিক্ষণ দেওয

Minimum of 2 years’ relevant working experience required. Responsibilities & Context BRAC is an international development organisation founded in Bangladesh that partners with over 100 million people living with inequality and poverty globally to create sustainable opportunities to realise potential. BRAC is the pioneer of the Graduation approach, a globally recognised holistic solution to curb extreme poverty. Since 2002, BRAC`s flagship, the Ultra-Poor Graduation program, has reached more than 2.2 million households in 48 districts of Bangladesh and supported them to sustainably break the poverty trap. Join us at BRAC to build an inclusive society free from the clutches of extreme poverty. It`s not just a job but a platform to drive real changes for those who need it the most. Be a part of the journey. Working at brac is not like any other job. It is a platform where you can bring about real change for people who need it the most. We are not just dreaming of a better world, we are building it. Join us to find the way. Job Purpose Contribute to the sustainable graduation of targeted ultra-poor persons with disabilities in the respective zone and regions by identifying their psychosocial and mental health support needs. Designing and implementing holistic interventions which includes enhancement of their mental capacity, self-stream, enterprise and role-engagement, life skills, also ensuring access to essential services through appropriate referrals. In addition, the role involves providing capacity development and technical support to frontline staffs and educating caregivers, family and community for strengthening the overall effectiveness of the planned interventions. job_title: Assistant / Deputy Manager (Compensation & Benefits), Human Resources
job_description:
Assistant / Deputy Manager (Compensation & Benefits), Human Resources : Edison Real Estate Limited Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Edison Real Estate Limited Assistant / Deputy Manager (Compensation & Benefits), Human Resources Application Deadline : 10 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Company Information Summary Vacancy: 01 Location: Dhaka Salary: Negotiable Published: 08 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Professional training or certification in Payroll Management, Taxation, or Compensation & Benefits is highly preferred. 4-7 years of experience in Payroll, Compensation & Benefits, and Employee Tax Management.§ Proven experience managing compensation & benefits for multiple business units. Strong working knowledge of Bangladesh labor laws, income tax regulations, provident fund rules, and statutory compliance. High proficiency in payroll systems, HRIS, and Excel (advanced level). Responsibilities & Context Manage end-to-end monthly payroll processing across business units, ensuring accuracy, confidentiality, and timely disbursement. Independently handle employee income tax calculation, TDS, annual tax planning, certificates, and full compliance with Bangladesh tax laws. Administer incentives, bonuses, and variable pay, coordinating with HR, Finance, and business heads for validation and timely payouts. Manage Provident Fund (PF) enrollment, contributions, submissions, withdrawals, reconciliations, and statutory compliance. Prepare, monitor, and control payroll and C&B overhead budgets; analyze cost trends, variances, forecasts, and optimization opportunities. Maintain payroll systems, compensation data, statutory records, and generate periodic payroll, tax, PF, and cost reports. Ensure compliance with company C&B policies, Bangladesh Labor Law, and statutory regulations; support audits and policy changes. Act as the single point of contact for all payroll, compensation, benefits, and statutory matters. Skills & Expertise Compensation & Benefits Payroll Suggested by Human Resource Management Human rights Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Job Location Dhaka Company Information Edison Real Estate Limited Follow Address: Rangs Babylonia, Level - 9, 246 Bir Uttam Mir Shawkat Road,
Tejgaon I/A, Dhaka-1208. Within these 4 years of professional experience, a minimum of 3 years of experience must be after postgraduation. Language: Fluency in spoken and written both in English and Bangla language. Responsibilities & Context BACKGROUND AND PURPOSE OF THE ASSIGNMENT The VAM Officer (Economic and Market Analyst) will work under the supervision of the Head of the RAM Unit at the WFP Bangladesh Country Office. He/she will oversee day‑to‑day activities and provide end‑to‑end analytics—from price data collection, market analysis, and economic modeling to policy advice—to inform market‑based assistance, targeting, and early warning. The role will involve regular engagement with local governments, UN agencies, and other partners; oversight of data collection activities; analysis of market and economic information; and the preparation of reports, briefs, and analytical papers. Specifically, the responsibilities of the VAM Officer (Economic and Market Analyst) will include the following elements: KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES (not all-inclusive, within delegated authority): Design and manage routine market price data collection, including sample frame development, tool design, enumerator training, and spot checks. Track key commodities, wage rates, transport costs, and seasonal availability, ensuring adequate geospatial coverage. Produce monthly market bulletins and ad hoc alerts for shocks (e.g., floods, cyclones, displacement, and policy changes). Lead market functionality assessments, including trader capacity, competition, supply routes, and inventory turnover. Provide inputs on the feasibility of food assistance modalities—Cash and Voucher vs. in kind—supported by vendor transaction analysis. Monitor transfer values using real time price data and conduct outlier checks. Manage data pipelines (mobile data collection using MoDA/ODK/KoBo, data cleaning, and validation rules). About Acted Created in 1993, Acted is an international non-governmental organization pursuing a dual mandate of emergency response and development interventions in 40 of some of the world’s most vulnerable countries affected by conflicts, disasters, or socio-economic hardship. With a team of 7,000 national staff and 400 international staff, Acted implements 500 projects a year to support more than 20 million beneficiaries, notably in hard-to-reach areas. Acted goes to the last mile through programs and approaches that look beyond the immediate emergency towards opportunities for longer-term livelihood reconstruction and sustainable development. Guided by the motto “Think Local, Act Global” and it’s 3Zero –Zero Exclusion, Zero Carbon, and Zero Poverty – strategy, Acted puts local territories at the center and provides tailored support to local needs. More on www.acted.org In Bangladesh, Acted started its activities in 2018 in order to respond to the Rohingya Refugee Crisis in the sectors of Site Management Support, NFI/LPG Distribution, Natural Resource Management, Information Management, Emergency Preparedness Response, and CDCS in the Camps of the Kutupalong-Balukhali Expansion Site, Cox’s Bazar. Click link at the bottom part of the ad to view detail job ad. Acted is working in the Rohingya refugee camps of the Kutupalong-Balukhali Expansion Site at the Ukhia sub-district of Cox’s Bazar, Bangladesh. In line with its 3Zero programming strategy, Acted’s work in Bangladesh focuses on the following thematic areas: Collaborative and Resilient Ecosystem Management, Access to Basic Services, Strengthening Institutions and Civil Society, and Humanitarian Action. Role Purpose: To support in the delivery of high quality & on time bulk production.  Maintaining excellent quality, low returns and on-time delivery. Impact: Expectations in the role: · Specifications & Pre-Production samples : Ensure specifications are accurate for bulk production. Check pre-production samples, issuing comments from the sealed salesman sample issued by the Development team. · Trims approval: Trims pack, accessory & label approvals. · Testing : Carry out in-house testing of garments, fabrics & trims as required, including spray rating & hydrostatic head. · Bulk Production: Ensure bulk production is according to original design specification for style & measure, issuing comments on production samples and communicating any discrepancies with the UK Production & Quality team. · Inspections: Regularly visit factories to do inline & final inspections, reporting back to the Senior Production & Quality Specialists if any issues are found.  Work with factory & UK team if needed to find a solution, ensuring no products ship at a grade 3 or above. · AQL: Issue quality acceptance letters to the factories. · Documentation: Keep style files up to date, including all comments, testing & AQL. · Collaboration: Work closely with the Xiamen Merchandisers & UK Production & Quality team to ensure corporate calendar deadlines are met.  Attend weekly critical path meetings to discuss production issues and escalate as necessary. · Relationships: Establish good relationships with suppliers, factories & the UK product teams to ensure good quality control & on time deliveries. · Compliance / audits : Fully responsible for Craghoppers Compliance audits and during factory visits, carry out basic compliance assessments using the Regatta in house forms & report back to the UK team any non-compliances found. · Factory Feedback: Provide feedback on factories for the Gold/Silver/Bronze rating. · Housekeeping: Ensure samples, paperwork, and electronic data are archived, accurate, and up to date. · Other: Undertake such tasks as may be reasonably requested by your manager or other members of the management team. Performance Indicators: Measurable outcomes · Deliveries on Time · Grade 1 QC result

job_description: Assistant Manager / SR. Executive - Accounts and Order processing : Bir Group Holdings Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Bir Group Holdings Assistant Manager / SR. Executive - Accounts and Order processing Application Deadline : 09 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Location: Dhaka (Tejgaon) Salary: Negotiable Published: 08 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Executive Level: Minimum 2–3 years of relevant experience in accounts and order processing. Senior Executive Level: Minimum 5–8 years of relevant experience in accounts and finance operations. Responsibilities & Context Accounts & Order Processing will be responsible for maintaining accurate financial records, managing sales orders, ensuring proper accounting entries, and supporting day-to-day accounts operations using Tally software and manual registers. The role requires strong analytical skills, compliance with financial regulations, and effective coordination with vendors, suppliers, and internal stakeholders. Process sales orders accurately using Tally software. Record and manage sales collections in Tally software. Enter purchase transactions on a daily basis in Tally software. Verify and review bills and vouchers before processing vendor payments and posting entries into Tally. Verify, allocate, post, and reconcile accounts payable and receivable. Maintain the general ledger and assist with month-end closing activities. Ensure all financial transactions are properly recorded, classified, and documented to support preparation of financial statements. Develop and maintain a centralized accounting system for effective account management. Reconcile vendor accounts and resolve discrepancies in a timely manner. Prepare financial documents including bills, invoices, pay-orders, purchase orders, payables, and receivables. Coordinate and manage payment and billing details with suppliers, vendors, and external service providers. Prepare monthly bank reconciliation statements. Perform monthly stock reconciliation using Tally software. Maintain and preserve accounting documents and records systematically. Carry out any other duties and responsibilities assigned by management from time to time. Have excellent language skills both English and Bengali. Responsibilities & Context BRAC is an international development organisation founded in Bangladesh in 1972 that partners globally with over 100 million people living with inequality and poverty to create opportunities to realise their potential. The Warehouse Assistant will play an active role in the smooth operation of HCMP’s busy warehouse by supporting material receiving, dispatching, physical counting, and assisting Warehouse Officers in stock management. They will ensure timely documentation, maintain warehouse cleanliness, organize materials systematically, and actively contribute to continuous improvement, key performance targets, and training initiatives. Assist in loading and unloading of materials during dispatch and receiving; maintain proper FIFO, LIFO, and FEFO stacking and counting procedures. Collect, verify, and ensure the timely submission of all warehouse-related bills (labor, dumper transport, electricity, and services) with thorough checks and proper approvals. Maintain organized records of all financial and warehouse documents to support finance, audit, and reporting requirements. Update Stack Cards (BIN cards) and Stock Cards daily; prepare manual GRNs and maintain accurate daily work reports. Verify issuing documents such as Store/Warehouse Requisitions, ensuring authorization and correctness before dispatching goods. Check material quality and quantity against requisitions; prepare and approve Delivery Challans/Waybills as required. Regularly inspect and monitor warehouse materials to ensure they are kept in good condition and report any discrepancies. Conduct periodic physical stock counts to ensure alignment between physical stock and book records, documenting findings properly. Manage labor attendance, prepare payment sheets, and ensure efficient labor operations in compliance with warehouse SOPs and Health & Safety regulations. Enforce warehouse security by restricting unauthorized access, promptly reporting any safety or security concerns to the supervisor. Report to Warehouse officer, Warehouse Supervisor, Senior M

job_title: Senior Officer / Assistant Manager - Credit Analyst (SME Credit)
job_description: Senior Officer / Assistant Manager - Credit Analyst (SME Credit) : LankaBangla Finance PLC. Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List LankaBangla Finance PLC. Senior Officer / Assistant Manager - Credit Analyst (SME Credit) Application Deadline : 21 Feb 2026 Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Company Information Summary Vacancy: 2 Age: At most 35 years Location: Chattogram, Narayanganj Salary: Negotiable Published: 08 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age At most 35 years Responsibilities & Context Find out client`s fund requirements, key financial indicators, repayment capacity, risk & its mitigation, collateral security aspects, bank transaction performance, portfolio growth & turnover, business & product nature, major customers/competitors, etc. Recommendation of CMSME credit proposals for approval/rejection to superior authority based on physical visit observations, analysis of financial information, and consideration of other subjective issues within standard TAT. MIS maintaining, communication, and reporting. Deposit mobilization, achieving additional set goals periodically by organization other than regular work such as TDR, Money Builders, and others. Coordinate with related SME relationship management, branch officials, operations, and other departments in a timely and effective manner to ensure an effective value chain. Besides, communicate credit risk issues with all stakeholders to safeguard the interest of LBFL. Conduct physical visits of all SME borrowers and proposed securities to validate financial information, KYC, ensure due diligence, and other subjective issues. Scrutiny and evaluation of SME credit proposals received from SME Financial Service Department in light of internal & external lending policies, credit circulars, and instructions (Head Office & Bangladesh Bank). Monitoring existing portfolio with the coordination of business and collection team and conducting post-disbursement visits for irregular borrowers and guarantors on a regular basis for reducing PAR and NPL of LBFL. Initiating coaching & training for branch SME team development for raising their potentials and ensuring upgradation of relevant knowledge. Review/apply delegation of (as determined by the Board) the files from the credit analysts from assigned region. Assist Zonal Credit Manager on specific projects/tasks as assigned related to internal work, current market situation, and giving feedback on market, industry/sector, portfolio, etc. to all relevant concerns. Skills & Expertise Credit Analysis Suggested by Credit Management Relationship Management SME Credit Banks & Financial Employment Status Full Time Job Location Chattogram, Narayanganj Apply Procedure Email Your CV Send your CV to the given email career@lankabangla.com Company Information LankaBangla Financ

Jr Officer/Officer - Mechanical Engineer : Quality Feeds Limited Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Quality Feeds Limited Jr Officer/Officer - Mechanical Engineer Application Deadline : 10 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Age: 27 to 32 years Location: Bogura, Gazipur Salary: Negotiable Published: 08 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 27 to 32 years Strong knowledge of mechanical maintenance and troubleshooting. Basic understanding of hydraulics, pneumatics, bearings, lubrication systems, and welding/fabrication. Ability to read mechanical drawings and manuals. Familiarity with preventive maintenance systems. Good communication and teamwork skills. Ability to work under pressure and handle emergency breakdowns. Basic computer skills (MS Excel, maintenance reports). Willingness to work in shift duty, if required. Responsibilities & Context Quality Feeds Limited is seeking a competent and proactive Jr. Officer / Officer – Mechanical Engineer to support factory operations through effective maintenance, troubleshooting, and optimization of mechanical equipment. The role involves ensuring smooth production, minimizing downtime, and maintaining safety and quality standards in a manufacturing environment. Responsibilities Perform preventive, corrective, and breakdown maintenance of mechanical equipment and machinery. Ensure smooth operation of boilers, compressors, conveyors, gearboxes, pumps, motors, mixers, and production machinery . Identify mechanical faults and take prompt corrective actions to reduce downtime . Assist in installation, commissioning, and modification of machinery and equipment. Maintain maintenance logs, checklists, job cards, and spare parts records . Coordinate with production teams to support uninterrupted factory operations. Ensure compliance with safety standards, factory rules, and maintenance SOPs . Monitor equipment performance and suggest improvement and cost reduction initiatives . Support energy efficiency and preventive maintenance planning. Supervise technicians and mechanics during maintenance activities when required. Liaise with vendors and contractors for repair, fabrication, and spare parts procurement. Participate in audits, inspections, and continuous improvement activities. Skills & Expertise mechanical maintenance Mechanical Engineering Compensation & Other Benefits Gratuity,Performance bonus,Mobile bill Salary Review: Yearly Festival Bonus: 2 Other benefits as per company policy. job_title: Business Development & Marketing Officer, CHARKA Initiative
job_description:
Business Development & Marketing Officer, CHARKA Initiative : Jagorani Chakra Foundation Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Jagorani Chakra Foundation Business Development & Marketing Officer, CHARKA Initiative Application Deadline : 16 Feb 2026 Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Age: At most 40 years Location: Jashore Salary: Tk. 27692 (Monthly) Published: 08 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age At most 40 years 3–5 years of experience in business development or marketing, preferably in the handicraft or SME sector. 	Experience in online marketing and digital sales platforms is highly desirable. 	Strong marketing and negotiation skills. 	Knowledge of handicraft/fashion markets. 	Digital marketing and social media management skills. 	Analytical and reporting abilities. 	Teamwork and coordination skills. Maximum 40 years (Age is flexible for deserving applicants) Responsibilities & Context Jagorani Chakra Foundation (JCF) is a national voluntary social welfare organization. JCF is going to implement CHARKA: Women Entrepreneurs Empowering Women Project supported by EDUCO. To ensure the quality implementation of the project, JCF intends to recruit project staff for this leadership position from qualified candidates of Bangladeshi nationals. Job Responsibility:  Develop and implement business development and marketing strategies for CHARKA products.  Promote CHARKA products through online platforms, including F-commerce, E-Commerce and social media.  Establish and maintain linkages with buyers, retailers, and market actors.  Support product innovation through market feedback and trend analysis.  Coordinate raw materials sourcing and ensure quality checks.  Support branding, promotional campaigns, and sales events.  Prepare market analysis, sales reports, and performance documentation.  Follow the organization's Child Safeguarding, Protection from Sexual Exploitation and Abuse (PSEA), Gender, Whistle Blowing and other Policies. Compensation & Other Benefits Consolidated Tk. 27,692 per month and other admissible benefits as per
organizational policy as well as the project. Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Job Location Jashore Read Before Apply Application sending address: Jagorani Chakra Foundation, Head Office, 46 Mujib Sarak, Jashore- 7400. Interested candidates are requested to send their CV (If the CV sends through E-mail, please give the CV in PDF Format within 3 pages), passport-size colour photograph with a cover letter for the above position to the Executive Director, Jagorani Chakra Foundation, 46 Mujib Sarak, Jashore- 7400. Please write down the mobile number in the application and the name of the position on the top of the envelop/E-mail subject line. Short-listed candidate

We place particular importance on applicants who have a proven sales record in technical or project-based sales, with measurable achievements in securing projects and expanding business within Government, Semi-Government, and Private Utility organizations. We strongly encourage applications from candidates who: Have a proven track record in Lighting, Electrical, or Technical product sales, preferably in Government or Utility sectors. Possess strong market knowledge and an established professional network within Government departments, utility companies, consultants, and contractors. Are familiar with tender processes, project sales cycles, and institutional procurement procedures. Have excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills. Key Responsibilities: Develop and implement effective sales and marketing strategies to promote Adex Lighting product lines including Indoor, Outdoor, Industrial, and Infrastructure Lighting solutions. Identify, approach, and maintain relationships with Government agencies, Utility companies, Consultants, Contractors, and Private sector clients. Explore new project opportunities, monitor tender notices, and actively participate in bidding processes. Understand client requirements and propose technically sound and cost-effective lighting solutions. Coordinate with design, technical, and project teams to ensure smooth execution and client satisfaction. Prepare and deliver technical presentations, product demonstrations, proposals, and periodic sales reports. Achieve assigned sales targets while maintaining strong after-sales service and long-term client relationships. Stay updated on lighting technologies, energy-efficient solutions, and industry trends to provide value-added consultation. Maintain accurate sales records and utilize digital reporting tools for performance tracking and pipeline management. With a team of 7,000 national staff and 400 international staff, Acted implements 500 projects a year to support more than 20 million beneficiaries, notably in hard-to-reach areas. Acted goes to the last mile through programs and approaches that look beyond the immediate emergency towards opportunities for longer-term livelihood reconstruction and sustainable development. job_description: Engineer / Senior Engineer - Liaison & Regulatory Affairs : Intraco Group Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Intraco Group Engineer / Senior Engineer - Liaison & Regulatory Affairs Application Deadline : 09 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 3 Location: Dhaka Salary: Negotiable Published: 08 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements 5 to 10 years of proven experience in real estate project liaison, coordination, or approval management. Must have hands-on experience dealing with RAJUK, CDA, CoxDA, and other development authorities in Bangladesh. Prior experience in hotel/resort or large-scale real estate projects will be an added advantage. Excellent communication and negotiation skills with regulatory bodies.Strong understanding of building codes, approval processes, and government procedures.Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines. Proficiency in MS Office and basic knowledge of AutoCAD preferred. Willingness to travel frequently across project locations. Job Location: Dhaka (with frequent visits to project sites at Chattogram, Cox’s Bazar, Comilla, and Tangail) Both male and female candidates are encouraged to apply. Responsibilities & Context Intraco Properties Limited , a concern of Intraco Group , is a growing real estate and infrastructure development company in Bangladesh. The company is engaged in developing residential, commercial, and hospitality projects in Dhaka, Chattogram, Cox’s Bazar, Tangail, and other key locations. To support our upcoming projects and ensure efficient coordination with design consultants and regulatory authorities, we are looking for a dynamic and experienced professional to join our team. Job Context The selected candidate will play a vital role in managing liaison and coordination activities with external architects, engineers, and government authorities to ensure timely approvals and smooth project execution. This position reports directly to the Chief Operating Officer (COO) . Key Responsibilities Maintain close liaison with external architects, structural engineers, MEP engineers, and BOQ engineers for project design and documentation. Coordinate with RAJUK, CDA, Cox’s Bazar Development Authority (CoxDA) , and other regulatory bodies for necessary project approvals, permits, and renewals . Follow up on land, design, and construction approvals at both government and local authority levels (Dhaka, Chattogram, Cox’s Bazar, Comilla, Tangail). Prepare and submit project-related applications, documents, and compliance reports to relevant authorities. Assist in reviewing drawings and project plans before submission for approval. Maintain effective communication with consultants and contractors to ensure alignment with regulatory requirements.

job_description: Project Officer, SHIKHA Project; Social Compliance : BRAC Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List BRAC Project Officer, SHIKHA Project; Social Compliance Application Deadline : 21 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Age: At least 18 years Location: Anywhere in Bangladesh Salary: Negotiable Published: 08 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age At least 18 years Strong understanding of sexual harassment prevention, gender-based violence (GBV) prevention, and basic legal rights; Knowledge of civil society organisations (CSOs) and disability inclusion; Ability to travel anywhere in Bangladesh. Responsibilities & Context BRAC is an international development organisation founded in Bangladesh in 1972 that partners globally with over 100 million people living with inequality and poverty to create opportunities to realise their potential. Working at BRAC is not like any other job. It is a platform where you can bring about real change for people who need it the most. We are not just dreaming of a better world, we are building it with our partners. Join us to find the way. About the Project The SHIKHA project funded by the European Union (EU) under the Social Compliance Programme aims to strengthen prevention and response to all forms of gender-based violence (GBV) in the public and workplaces in Bangladesh through legislative change and effective enforcement, strengthening systems, and addressing harmful social norms and gender stereotypes. The project will work in Dhaka, Gazipur, Chattogram, Barisal, Narayanganj, and Rajshahi districts in 250 workplaces, 270 educational institutions, public places, digital platforms, and with the Government of Bangladesh. About the Role The Project Officer is responsible for planning, implementing, and monitoring community-based interventions aimed at preventing and responding to Gender-Based Violence (GBV) and sexual harassment, with a particular focus on educational institutions and community settings. The role ensures effective coordination with stakeholders, delivery of awareness and capacity-building initiatives, survivor-centered case management, and promotion of safeguarding practices in alignment with BRAC’s values and principles. Key Responsibilities: Plan, organise, and ensure timely and quality implementation of project activities as per the approved work plan. Conduct awareness and capacity-building sessions on Gender-Based Violence (GBV) and sexual harassment for targeted groups in educational institutions and communities. Facilitate the establishment and effective functioning of Sexual Harassment Redress Committees (SHRCs) in educational institutions. Ensure prompt reporting of GBV incidents and coordinate with relevant stakeholders to support survivor-centered

Chapainawabganj, Dhaka, Jamalpur, Tangail Salary: Tk. 35000 (Monthly) Published: 08 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 30 to 40 years •	এনজিও/ আর্থিক প্রতিষ্ঠানে ঋণ কার্যক্রমে মাঠ পর্যায়ে ব্রাঞ্চ বা ব্রাঞ্চ ম্যানেজার হিসেবে ব্রাঞ্চ পরিচালনায় কমপক্ষে ৪ বছরের বাস্তব অভিজ্ঞতা থাকতে হবে •	ঢাকায় কর্মরত দের অধিকার দেয়া হবে •	কম্পিউটারের এমএস ওয়ার্ড, এমএস এক্সেল, পাওয়ার পয়েন্ট ও ইন্টারনেট এবং যে কোনো ধরনের সফ্টওয়্যার পরিচালনায় পারদর্শীতা থাকতে হবে । •	ইএসডিও’র মাইক্রোফিন্যান্স কর্মসূচির যেকোন কর্মস্থলে কাজ করার মানষিকতা থাকতে হবে। •	চাকুরীতে যোগদানের সময় ৩০০/- (তিনশত) টাকা মুল্যের নন-জুটিশিয়াল ষ্ট্যাম্পে উপযুক্ত জামিনদার কর্তৃক অঙ্গীকারনামা প্রদান করতে হবে। •	সাক্ষাৎকারের সময় মুল সনদ পত্র দেখাতে হবে এবং চাকুরীতে যোগদানের সময় সকল শিক্ষাগত যোগ্যতার মুল সনদ মানব সম্পদ বিভাগে জমা রাখতে হবে। •	চাকুরীতে যোগদানের সময় এক মাসের বেতন সমপরিমাণ টাকা (ফেরতযোগ্য) জামানত প্রদান করতে হবে এবং স্বাস্থ্য পরীক্ষার সনদ জমা প্রদান করতে হবে। Responsibilities & Context গনপ্রজাতন্ত্রী বাংলাদেশ সরকারের মাইক্রোক্রেডিট রেগুলেটরী অথরিটি (এমআরএ)’র সনদপ্রাপ্ত বে-সরকারী উন্নয়ণ সংস্থা ইকো-সোশ্যাল ডেভলপমেন্ট অর্গানাইজেশন (ইএসডিও)। ইএসডিও ১৯৮৮ সালে দরিদ্র ও প্রান্তিকদের প্রতি সংহতি প্রতিষ্ঠার লক্ষ্যে একটি মহৎ দৃষ্টি দিয়ে যাত্রা শুরু করে। জনগণের কেন্দ্রিক সংগঠন হওয়ায় ইএসডিও এমন একটি সমাজের কল্পনা করেছিল যা অসমতা ও অবিচার থেকে মুক্ত হবে। ইএসডিও সামাজিক উন্নয়ন ও দক্ষতা বৃদ্ধি মূলক বিভিন্ন কার্যক্রম/ প্রকল্প বাস্তবায়ন করে আসছে। ইএসডিও বর্তমানে দেশের ৫৩টি জেলার ৪০৮ উপজেলায় ১৫ মিলিয়ন অতি দরিদ্র মানুষের সার্বিক উন্নয়নে কাজ করছে। Job Responsibilities •	কর্মসূচী কাজকর্ম মনিটরিং ও সুপারভিশন করার জন্য নিয়মিত মাঠ পরিদর্শনের পরিকল্পনা করা এবং পরিকল্পনা অনুসারে মাঠ পরিদর্শন করা; •	শাখা অফিস কর্মী কর্তৃক সাপ্তাহিক/মাসিক/ত্রৈমাসিক/ষান্মাসিক/বাৎসরিক প্রদত্ত সকল কাজ কর্ম ও প্রতিবেদন/রিপোর্ট পর্যালোচনা করা ও তাদেরকে প্রয়োজনীয় ফিড ব্যাক দেয়া; •	কর্মসূচীর সাপ্তাহিক/মাসিক/ত্রৈমাসিক/ষান্মাসিক/বাৎসরিক প্রতিবেদন তৈরী করা ও সময়মত কর্তৃপক্ষকে প্রদান করা । •	মাঠকর্মীরা সাপ্তাহিক সভা সঠিকভাবে পরিচালনা করছেন কি-না তা পর্যবেক্ষণ করবেন ও প্রয়োজনীয় পরামর্শ প্রদান করবেন। •	মাঠকর্মীদের নিকট হতে সমিতির সদস্যদের ঋণ প্রস্তাব গ্রহণ করবেন এবং পরবর্তী প্রয়োজনীয় ব্যবস্থা গ্রহণ করবেন। •	উপকারভোগীদের মধ্যে বিতরণকৃত ঋণ সুষ্ঠুভাবে প্রকল্প অনুযায়ী ব্যবহার হচ্ছে কিনা এবং তা নির্ধারিত শর্তানুযায়ী আদায় হচ্ছে কিনা তা অনুসরণ করবেন এবং প্রয়োজনীয় পদক্ষেপ গ্রহণ করবেন। •	আর্থিক নির্দেশিকা অনুযায়ী হিসাব নিকাশ পরিচালনা করা এবং সকল নথি সংরক্ষণ নিশ্চিত করা; •	জেলা ও উপজেলা পর্যায়ের কর্মকর্তা এবং সহকারী পরিচালক (কার্যক্রম)/উ

Warehouse Officer, Admin & Operations, HCMP : BRAC Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List BRAC Warehouse Officer, Admin & Operations, HCMP Application Deadline : 19 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Location: Cox`s Bazar (Ukhia) Salary: Negotiable Published: 09 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Have commitment to an understanding of BRAC core values and principles. Have good reporting skill with office applications Have willingness to live and work in difficult and rapidly changing conditions. Have ability and willingness to travel and stay in the field. Have excellent language skills both English and Bengali Responsibilities & Context BRAC is an international development organisation founded in Bangladesh in 1972 that partners globally with over 100 million people living with inequality and poverty to create opportunities to realise their potential. This position will oversee the warehouse operations, manage inventory and ensure compliance with organizational policies and safeguarding standards. Additionally, the role requires the delivery of goods to various project sites under the Humanitarian Crisis Management Programme (HCMP) of BRAC within the assigned operational areas. Receive, inspect, and issue store materials with accurate record-keeping; maintain management-wise inventory and delivery sheets separately. Ensure proper store operations, including safe receiving, storage, retrieval, and timely dispatch of goods, maintaining registers as per Purchase Orders (PO). Prepare Goods Receipt Notes (GRN) upon receipt of goods and ensure proper file management of all supporting documents (Waybill, Challan, PO, GRN, etc.). Update ledger books and BIN cards daily after dispatch and receipt of goods; maintain labour registers and supervise labour for efficient operations. Maintain updated store ledgers and assist the Warehouse Supervisor in preparing weekly, monthly and yearly stock statements. Execute all warehouse operational activities, including dispatching materials per IMS software requisitions and arranging transportation for timely delivery. Conduct inventory receipt quality checks with the Quality team to ensure the quality, quantity, and specification compliance of materials received. Issue materials based on approved Supply Requests (SR) and support in the submission of monthly, quarterly, and yearly inventory and project closing reports. Securely maintain goods in the warehouse and ensure regular cleaning, pest control activities, and safety measures to protect inventory from rodents and other damages. Ensure efficient and cost-effective use of dumper transport by planning requisitions at least one day before material delivery. Plan warehouse space allocation in advance

Responsibilities & Context Transparency International Bangladesh (TIB) is inviting applications for appointment on contract basis for the position Research Assistant for its project titled “Promoting Integrity in Solid Waste Management towards Climate Justice in Bangladesh” Job Description: Assist in designing data collection tools and supervising field level data collection; Assist in checking and cross-checking survey data; Collect and analyse secondary data; Assist data analysis and visualization using STATA and GIS Software; Assist in arranging and conducting interviews; Transcribe and translate the recorded interviews; Assist in thematic analysis and coding of qualitative data using NVivo; Assist in writing reports in English and translate into Bangla; Assist in preparing and presenting research findings; Study related administrative work, training arrangement, communication with stakeholders; Any other tasks assigned by the management. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age At most 45 years Responsibilities & Context প্রতিষ্ঠানের সারসংক্ষেপ: IDEAL (ভূমিহীনদের উন্নয়নের জন্য উন্নয়ন শিক্ষা প্রতিষ্ঠান) ১৯৮৭ সালে বাংলাদেশের সাতক্ষীরা জেলার দেবহাটা উপজেলার পারুলিয়া গ্রামে প্রতিষ্ঠিত একটি স্থানীয় এনজিও। IDEAL ১৯৯১ সালে সমাজকল্যাণ বিভাগ, ১৯৯৬ সালে NGO-AB, ২০০৩ সালে যুব উন্নয়ন বিভাগ এবং ২০০৮ সালে ক্ষুদ্রঋণ নিয়ন্ত্রণ কর্তৃপক্ষ (এমআরএ) থেকে নিবন্ধন গ্রহণ করে ঋণ কার্যক্রম পরিচালনা করছে। IDEAL-এর একটি সংবিধান রয়েছে এবং সংগঠনটি সংবিধান দ্বারা পরিচালিত হয়। প্রথমে (১৯৮৭) IDEAL স্থানীয় দরিদ্র জনগোষ্ঠীকে তাদের অধিকার নিশ্চিত করার এবং তাদের ক্ষমতায়নের জন্য দায়িত্ব গ্রহণে সহায়তা করার লক্ষ্যে বিভিন্ন সমজাতীয় গোষ্ঠীতে সংগঠিত করা শুরু করে, যার লক্ষ্য ছিল নিজস্ব অর্থায়নে ক্ষুদ্র অর্থায়ন ও সঞ্চয়, প্রতিবন্ধী ব্যক্তিদের জন্য পরিষেবা, দরিদ্র পরিবারের অর্থনৈতিক উন্নয়ন, পরিবেশ উন্নয়নে এবং জলবায়ু পরিবর্তনে অভিঘাত মোকাবেলা ও নবায়নেযোগ্য জ্বালানী ব্যবহারের মাধ্যমে স্বাস্থ্য ঝুঁকি মোকাবেলায় তাদের ক্ষমতায়ন এবং আত্মকর্মসংস্থানের ব্যবহার করা। ১৯৯৮ সালে আইডিয়াল তার কার্যক্রমকে অধিকারভিত্তিক পদ্ধতিতে রূপান্তরিত করে এবং ভূমিহীনদের জন্য ভূমি অধিকার আন্দোলনের সাথে জড়িত হয়, বিশেষ করে নারীদের অধিকার নিশ্চিত করার জন্য গণসংগঠন গঠন করে এবং কৃষিক্ষেত্রে নারীদের অধিকার নিশ্চিত করার জন্য কাজ করে। চাকরির সারসংক্ষেপ: প্রতিবছর নির্ধারিত সময়ের মধ্যে শাখার পরিকল্পনা তৈরি ও দাখিল। মাসিক লক্ষ্যমাত্রা অর্জন এবং নির্ধারিত ছকে প্রতিবেদন প্রস্তুত ও জমা। নীতিমালা অনুযায়ী ঋণ বিতরণ, সঞ্চয় সংগ্রহ এবং বকেয়া আদায় নিশ্চিতকরণ। মাঠ পর্যায়ে সমিতি পরিদর্শন এবং কার্যক্রম পর্যবেক্ষণ। শাখার প্রশাসনিক কার্যক্রম পরিচালনা এবং কর্মীদের কার্যক্রম তদারকি। এমআইএস/এআইএস প্রতিবেদন প্রস্তুত, ব্যালান্সিং, বিল-ভাউচার যাচাই। দায়িত্ব এবং কর্তব্য: অফিস এবং মাঠ পর্যায়ের সকল কাজ সময়মত করা; শাখার লক্ষ্য মাত্রানুযায়ী গ্রুফ গঠন, প্রশিক্ষণ, কেন্দ্র মিটিং, গ্রুপ স্বীকৃতি, ঋণ বিতরন, ঋণ ও সঞ্চয় আদায় এবং প্রয়োজনে এগুলো পর্যালোচনা করা; মাঠকর্মকর্তা/সহ:হিসাবরক্ষক গণকে সংস্থার নীতিমালা ও প্রক্রিয়া সম্পর্কে যথেষ্ট ওয়াকেবহাল তা নিশ্চিত করা; এরিয়া ম্যানেজার ও প্রোগ্রাম অফিসারের সঙ্গে সমন্বয় রক্ষা করা; প্রাথমিক দলীয় তালিকা পর্যালোচনা করা এবং Feedback দেওয়া; দলীয় সদস্যদের বাড়ী পরিদর্শন করে তাদের Well-being অবস্থা জানা; সদস্যদের সংস্থার নীতিমালা অনুযায়ী সদস্যপদ অনুমোদন দেয়া; ঋণের জন্য আবেদনকারীর দেয়া তথ্য বাড়ী পরিদর্শন করে যাচাই করা; এরিয়া ম্যানেজারের নিকট অনুমোদনের জন্য ঋণের আবেদন পত্র জমা দেয়া; প্রত্যেক ঋণ
